articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description: Re @nanditmehra @LighthouseWeb3 @dhaiwat10 @dabit3 all metadata is hard-coded into our contract, this token not rendering is due to a rendering issue with svg that is not supported on opensea desktop that affects around 4% of the nfts, but should work on most other nft browsers like metamask mobile

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
Re @dabit3 @dhaiwat10 @kempsterrrr @Erik_Knobl @myz12371 ⚠️ Important ⚠️
Developer DAO’s $CODE token has not yet been launched. Anyone claiming that it has is a scam. Please keep yourselves safe. All official announcements will come directly from us via our Twitter account and on our website.
Stay tuned #codedrop

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Christina.lens | violetcrumble.eth 🍫 | ETHMX🇲🇽
Fortunate to work with these individuals across different teams to build web3 social. 
Please support our @EFDevcon application. 
Hop into the Devcon Forum to like the proposal to ensure our bid for a Web3 Social Community Hub is selected 💚
Gracias amigos y vamos a Colombia!
nader (🧱, 🚀) | nader.arweave.dev | nader.lens 🧢: Web3 Social Hub 🌿🪩
If you're planning to be in Bogotá 🇨🇴 for @EFDevcon events and want this to happen, hop into the forum and drop a comment or a like! ❤️
Thank you @shanvasion @Livepeer @AaveAave @LensProtocol @provenauthority @WaverlyMaven + others for spearheading this. 🙏

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Kasiasun 🇺🇦
So happy for our friends from @gitpoap! Let’s bring @github contributions on-chain 🚀
GitPOAP: We've raised a $4M Seed round to continue memorializing your contributions and accomplishments as GitPOAPs! 🥳

Also, today GitPOAP is ready for any open source Web 2.0 or web3 project to use.
Start onboarding here:
 https://www.theblock.co/post/164246/gitpoap-raises-4-million-to-bring-github-contributions-on-chain https://www.gitpoap.io/onboard
articles.title: RT Kasiasun 🇺🇦: So happy for our friends from @gitpoap! Let’s bring @github contributions on-chain 🚀
